title: Mumps outbreak triggers school closure and heightened surveillance in Alappuzha - The Hindu
summary:
Mumps Outbreak Leads to School Closures and Increased Surveillance in Alappuzha

Published on: January 11, 2025 06:32 pm IST

The Health department has ramped up surveillance and preventive measures due to a mumps outbreak in Alappuzha, resulting in the closure of two schools for 21 days.

  • Two schools closed: Government NS Lower Primary School and Government Lower Primary School.
  • 23 students from Eramalloor school and 9 from Perumbalam South have tested positive.
  • Previous closure due to 33 positive cases at another school last month.
  • Precautionary measures are being implemented in collaboration with local bodies.
  • K.C. Venugopal, MP, requests government action for testing and awareness programs.
“Despite being a vaccine-preventable disease, mumps was not included in the Universal Immunisation Programme.” - K.C. Venugopal

The mumps virus can lead to serious complications if untreated, and health officials encourage the public to seek medical advice for symptoms.
newTitle: Mumps Outbreak Leads to School Closures and Increased Surveillance in Alappuzha

Delhi polls: Arvind Kejriwal claims BJP's CM face will be Ramesh Bidhuri; Amit Shah reacts - The Times of India
summary:
Delhi polls: Arvind Kejriwal claims BJP's CM face will be Ramesh Bidhuri; Amit Shah reacts

Publication Date: Saturday

Source: Times of India

Aam Aadmi Party leader Arvind Kejriwal announced that the Bharatiya Janata Party has selected Ramesh Bidhuri as its chief ministerial candidate for the upcoming Delhi assembly elections.

  • Kejriwal suggests a public debate between Bidhuri and other candidates to discuss their visions for Delhi.
  • Amit Shah questioned the legitimacy of Kejriwal's announcement.
  • Kejriwal asserts that he is the declared CM face for his party.
  • BJP leaders state that the CM candidate will be announced by party leadership at the appropriate time.
“There must be a public debate between BJP’s CM candidate and other parties including us.” - Arvind Kejriwal

The political landscape in Delhi is heating up as both parties prepare for the upcoming elections, with Kejriwal challenging the BJP's selections and urging transparency in candidate decisions.
newTitle: Delhi polls: Kejriwal claims BJP's CM face is Ramesh Bidhuri; Amit Shah responds

title: Allu Arjun Gets BIG Relief In Fan's Death Case, Court Lists Down Relaxations For Pushpa 2 Actor - News18
summary:
Allu Arjun Gets BIG Relief In Fan's Death Case

Date: January 11, 2025 Source: News18

Allu Arjun received significant legal relaxations in connection with the Pushpa 2 stampede case, alleviating some conditions previously imposed on him after his arrest last month.

  • Allu Arjun was arrested in relation to a stampede incident that occurred at the Pushpa 2 premiere, which resulted in a woman's death and injuries to a child.
  • The Nampally court has exempted him from appearing at the Chikkadapally police station every Sunday for security reasons.
  • He has also been granted permission to travel abroad.

"The crowd went out of control after Allu Arjun stepped out of his car to greet fans attending the premiere," stated a source close to the incident.

This legal development comes after Allu Arjun was previously remanded to judicial custody and then granted interim bail.
newTitle: Allu Arjun Gets BIG Relief in Fan's Death Case

India's Champions Trophy And England Series Squad Live: BCCI To Take Drastic Step Over Jasprit Bumrah, Mohammed Siraj? - NDTV Sports
summary:
India's Champions Trophy 2025 And England Series Squad Announcement Live

Date: January 10, 2025 | Source: NDTV

The deadline for the squad selection for the Champions Trophy and the England white-ball series is fast approaching. India has requested an extension to submit the provisional squad, which needs to be finalized by February 12.

  • The BCCI selection committee, led by Ajit Agarkar, will announce the squads soon.
  • Following a disappointing performance against Australia, significant changes are likely.
  • Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma are expected to be included in the teams.
  • Mohammed Siraj and Jasprit Bumrah may not play in the T20Is but are expected to return for the ODIs.
  • KL Rahul's participation remains uncertain as he might be rested.
“Will the squad be announced today? Fans are eagerly awaiting the decisions from the selection committee.”

The live updates provide insights into the anticipated squad application and player conditions, with several players' fitness under scrutiny.
newTitle: India's Champions Trophy And England Series Squad Live: BCCI To Take Drastic Step Over Jasprit Bumrah, Mohammed Siraj?

Arvind Kejriwal congratulates 'BJP's CM face Ramesh Bidhuri', throws ‘debate’ challenge - Hindustan Times
summary:
Kejriwal Challenges BJP's CM Candidate Ramesh Bidhuri to Debate

Date: January 11, 2025   |   Source: Hindustan Times

Arvind Kejriwal, the leader of the Aam Aadmi Party (AAP), publicly challenged Ramesh Bidhuri to a debate, claiming that Bidhuri is expected to be the BJP's chief ministerial candidate for the upcoming Delhi assembly elections.

  • Kejriwal congratulated Bidhuri, anticipating his official announcement as the BJP's CM face.
  • He questioned Bidhuri's past contributions to Delhi during his tenure as an MP.
  • Kejriwal proposed a public debate between the chief ministerial candidates of both AAP and BJP after the official announcement.
  • The BJP Central Election Committee held a meeting to finalize candidates for the February 5 Delhi assembly election.
  • The election results are set to be announced on February 8, 2025.
“Ramesh Bidhuri should tell what he did for the development of Delhi while being an MP. What is his vision for Delhi?”

Kejriwal's challenge sets the stage for a potentially engaging political debate as the election approaches.
newTitle: Kejriwal Challenges BJP's CM Candidate Ramesh Bidhuri to Debate

Reliance Jio unleashed 5.5G network in partnership with OnePlus: Speeds up to 10 Gbps - India TV News
summary:
Reliance Jio Unleashed 5.5G Network in Partnership with OnePlus: Speeds Up to 10 Gbps

Publication Date: January 11, 2025 Source: India TV News

Reliance Jio, led by Mukesh Ambani, has introduced its groundbreaking ‘5.5G’ network in India. Developed in collaboration with OnePlus, this next-generation technology promises lightning-fast speeds, unmatched reliability, and a seamless internet experience.

Key Points:

  • Download Speeds: Up to 10 Gbps for instant downloads.
  • Upload Speeds: Up to 1 Gbps for quicker data sharing.
  • Low Latency: Faster response times for gaming and video calls.
  • Robust Connections: Stable performance even in crowded areas.
At the launch event, Jio demonstrated the capabilities of 5.5G. While traditional 5G reached speeds of 277 Mbps, Jio’s 5.5G network clocked over 1,014 Mbps.

The 5.5G network is designed to revolutionize mobile internet with key benefits such as faster downloads, lag-free streaming, enhanced gaming, and superior call quality.

Conclusion: Reliance Jio's 5.5G network represents a significant leap forward in mobile connectivity in India, promising a better overall user experience.
newTitle: Reliance Jio Launches 5.5G Network in Partnership with OnePlus

Jeju Air black box data missing from crucial minutes before crash, South Korea ministry says By Reuters - Investing.com
summary:
Jeju Air black box data missing from crucial minutes before crash, South Korea ministry says

Publication Date: [Insert date here] | Source: Reuters

SEOUL (Reuters) - The two black boxes on the Boeing jet involved in the worst aviation disaster on South Korean soil stopped recording about four minutes before the accident, the transport ministry said on Saturday.

Authorities investigating the crash plan to analyse what caused the black boxes to stop recording, the ministry stated.

Key Points:

  • Black boxes were essential for determining the cause of the crash that killed 179 people.
  • The accident occurred after a reported bird strike.
  • Missing data suggests all power may have been cut before the crash.
  • The investigation will involve ensuring transparency and sharing findings with victims' families.
Sim Jai-dong, a former transport ministry accident investigator, stated, "the discovery of the missing data... suggests all power may have been cut, which is rare."

In summary, the investigation will also focus on the embankment involved in the crash.
newTitle: Jeju Air Black Box Data Missing Before Tragic Crash

title: 'Rs 2,026cr loss': BJP attacks Kejriwal over CAG report on 'liquorgate'; 'fake', says AAP - The Times of India
summary:
BJP Criticizes Kejriwal Over CAG Report on Liquorgate Allegations

Publication Date: [Date Not Provided] Source: [Source Not Provided]

The BJP has attacked Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal following a CAG report which alleges a loss of Rs 2,026 crore in the 'liquorgate' scandal. In response, the AAP has labeled these accusations as 'fake'.

  • The CAG report highlights a significant financial loss associated with the liquor policy.
  • BJP leaders are demanding accountability from Kejriwal regarding the alleged mismanagement.
  • AAP has staunchly defended itself, claiming the report is fabricated.
'This report proves our point about corruption in Kejriwal's administration,' a BJP spokesperson claimed.

The controversy continues to escalate as both parties trade accusations, underscoring the political tensions surrounding governance in Delhi.
newTitle: BJP Criticizes Kejriwal Over CAG Report on Liquorgate Allegations

title: Ceiling slab collapses at Kannauj railway station, several feared trapped - Hindustan Times
summary:
Ceiling Slab Collapses at Kannauj Railway Station, Several Feared Trapped

Date: Jan 11, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

A major accident occurred at Kannauj railway station on Saturday when a ceiling slab of an under-construction building collapsed, trapping several workers and railway staff under the debris.

  • A rescue operation was launched immediately; 23 individuals have been rescued so far.
  • About 40 persons were present on site at the time of the collapse.
  • The incident occurred while work was being done to lay the ceiling slab for a new building.
  • Rescue teams from SDRF, GRP, RPF, and local police are engaged in operations.
“Panic ensued, and locals rushed to the site, but were unable to help due to the heavy debris.”

The event highlights the urgent need for safety measures in construction sites to prevent such accidents.
newTitle: Ceiling Slab Collapse at Kannauj Railway Station: Rescue Operations Underway

title: Taliban skips summit on Muslim girls' education in Pakistan - Hindustan Times
summary:
Taliban Declines to Attend Global Summit on Muslim Girls' Education in Pakistan

Date: Jan 11, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Taliban in Afghanistan did not attend a global summit focused on education for Muslim girls held in Pakistan, despite an invitation. The summit highlights the ongoing challenges faced by girls seeking education in Afghanistan.

  • The Taliban government has barred girls from education beyond sixth grade since regaining power in 2021.
  • Pakistan's education minister confirmed that the Taliban was invited but did not send representatives.
  • The summit features notable figures, including Nobel laureate Malala Yousafzai, who plans to address the importance of education for girls.
  • Pakistan Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif emphasized that denying education is the same as denying voice and choice.
“Denying education to girls is tantamount to denying their voice and their choice, while depriving them of their right to a bright future.” - Shehbaz Sharif

The absence of the Taliban at such a crucial summit highlights the ongoing educational crisis for girls in Afghanistan and raises significant concerns about their rights and future opportunities.
newTitle: Taliban Declines to Attend Global Summit on Muslim Girls' Education in Pakistan

title: Xiaomi Pad 7 launched in India with nano-texture display: Check price, features and more - Mint
summary:
Xiaomi Pad 7 Launched in India with Innovative Display Features

Publication Date: January 2024 | Source: Live Mint

Xiaomi has officially launched its updated Xiaomi Pad 7 in India, introducing enhanced features aimed at providing a premium tablet experience at competitive prices.

Xiaomi Pad 7 Pricing

The Xiaomi Pad 7 comes with a unique Nano-Texture Glass Display, offered in the top-end variant, and prices range from ₹26,999 to ₹31,999 across different configurations.

Xiaomi Pad 7 Specifications

The tablet boasts an 11.2-inch 3.2K display with a high refresh rate, supported by a powerful Snapdragon chipset, and features designed for enhanced usability.

  • Available in three variants: 8GB RAM + 128GB storage for ₹26,999
  • 12GB RAM + 256GB storage for ₹29,999
  • 12GB RAM + 256GB variant with Nano-Texture Glass for ₹31,999

Accessories

A range of new accessories has been unveiled to complement the tablet, enhancing user experience further.

“The Pad 7 will be available from January 13, while the Nano-Texture variant will go on sale from February 2025.”
newTitle: Xiaomi Pad 7 Launched in India with Innovative Display Features

title: Batters, Asitha Fernando give Sri Lanka consolation win - Cricbuzz
summary:
Sri Lanka Clinches Consolation Win Over New Zealand in Third ODI

Published on: Sat, Jan 11, 2025, 09:33 AM | Source: Cricbuzz

Sri Lanka gained a consolation win by clinching the third ODI against New Zealand by a massive margin of 140 runs, with significant contributions from batters and bowlers.

  • Sri Lanka set the highest score of the series, reaching 290 runs.
  • Asitha Fernando took three wickets in the powerplay, devastating New Zealand's batting lineup.
  • New Zealand struggled, collapsing to 21/5 early in their innings.
  • Mark Chapman scored a lone 81 runs but couldn't save the team from defeat.
  • Sri Lanka's Pathum Nissanka scored 66 runs, supported by Kusal Mendis and Janith Liyanage.
Brief Scores: Sri Lanka 290/8 (Pathum Nissanka 68, Kusal Mendis 54, Janith Liyanage 53; Matt Henry 4-55) beat New Zealand 150 all out (Mark Chapman 81; Asitha Fernando 3-26) by 140 runs

This win serves as a morale booster for Sri Lanka in their tour, showcasing their batting depth and bowling prowess.
newTitle: Sri Lanka Clinches Consolation Win Over New Zealand in Third ODI

Sunita Williams To Go On Her First Spacewalk In 12 Years - NDTV
summary:
Sunita Williams To Go On Her First Spacewalk In 12 Years

Publication Date: January 8, 2025

Source: NASA

Sunita Williams is set to undertake her first spacewalk in 12 years, joining fellow astronaut Nick Hague aboard the International Space Station on January 16 to repair the NICER X-ray telescope.

  • Williams will participate in two spacewalks on January 16 and January 23.
  • The January 16 mission will involve replacing a rate gyro assembly and repairing the NICER telescope.
  • The January 23 mission will focus on removing an antenna and testing for microbial life on the ISS exterior.
  • This will be Williams' eighth spacewalk and Hague's fourth.
“On January 16, NASA astronauts Nick Hague and Suni Williams will exit the space station to repair the NICER X-ray telescope.” — International Space Station

These spacewalks are part of NASA's ongoing efforts to maintain and upgrade the International Space Station.
newTitle: Sunita Williams To Go On Her First Spacewalk In 12 Years

title: Planetary Parade: A Celestial Spectacle for Stargazers in India and Odisha - OTV News
summary:
Planetary Parade: Celestial spectacle for stargazers in India and Odisha

Publication Date: January 2025

Source: OTV News

Astronomy enthusiasts across India are gearing up for a celestial treat with a rare planetary parade visible to the naked eye. This event promises a breathtaking alignment of major planets in the evening sky.

  • The planetary alignment peaks on January 18, featuring Venus and Saturn closely aligned.
  • The event is visible until around 20:30 on that date.
  • Apart from Venus and Saturn, other planets may also be observed throughout the month.
  • The phenomenon encourages public engagement and educational opportunities in astronomy.
  • Optimal viewing conditions are suggested away from urban light pollution.
“Such planetary alignments are infrequent, making them a highly anticipated event for astronomy aficionados.”

This planetary parade offers a unique experience for both amateur astronomers and the general public, fostering interest and education in astronomy.
newTitle: Celestial Parade: Stunning Planetary Alignment in India's Night Sky
